articles.description: DES MOINES, Iowa — The Grandstand lineup for the 2022 Iowa State Fair is full. The Fair announced on Wednesday that Rock-and-Roll Hall-of-Famers ZZ Top will play on Tuesday, August 16th. The performance will come a little more than a year after the death of f…

articles.title: Ed Sheeran Wins 'Shape of You' Plagiarism Lawsuit - Vulture
articles.description: “22 million songs a year and there’s only 12 notes that are available.”
articles.content: What do Ed Sheeran and the Chainsmokers have in common? Both are victims to the limited amount of notes in pop music. On April 6, Sheeran won a plagiarism suit over Shape of You wedged against him by… [+1188 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Olivia Rodrigo’s Sour Tour Is a Punky Heartbreak Revue - The New York Times
articles.description: Two nights after she won three Grammys, the new pop star began her first tour with a show both rowdy and intimate.
articles.content: PORTLAND, Ore. As a pop star, Olivia Rodrigos heritage includes precise dissectors and unruly shredders, the anguished and the angsty. Her debut album, Sour one of last years finest releases, and one… [+1129 chars]
